typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
DerivedColumn2 derive(filename = left(filter(split(fname,'_'), endsWith(#item, '.csv'))[1],length(fname)-4),
		mydate = toDate(mydate1,'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> DerivedColumn1
source1 derive(fname = '/scoredfiles/2020/ingop/in_202002_braunapprove.csv',
		mydate1 = toString(currentDate())) ~> DerivedColumn2
